channel.title: Comments on: MySQL Cluster 7.1.8 binaries released
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: admin
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
In reply to <a href="./../mysql-cluster-7-1-8-binaries-released/index.html#comment-437">Nicolas</a>.
Nicolas, For those distributions, just use the generic LINUX tar ball.
Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Nicolas.

Nicolas,
For those distributions, just use the generic LINUX tar ball.

Andrew.

item.title: By: Nicolas
item.dc:creator: Nicolas
item.description:
mysql-cluster for redhat suse
But no Ubuntu? or Debian?
surely these are widely used.
item.content:encoded:

redhat
suse

But no Ubuntu? or Debian?
